headline: The Bull Case For Cadence Design Systems (CDNS) Could Change Following Its Lightmatter Photonics Collaboration – Learn Why
summary: In January 2026, Lightmatter announced a technical collaboration with Cadence Design Systems to co-develop co-packaged optics solutions that combine Cadence’s silicon-proven high-speed SerDes and UCIe IP with Lightmatter’s Passage optical engine for next-generation AI and high-performance computing systems. This partnership highlights how Cadence is extending its electronic design automation and IP capabilities into tightly integrated photonic interconnects, positioning its technology stack...

This partnership highlights how Cadence is extending its electronic design automation and IP capabilities into tightly integrated photonic interconnects, positioning its technology stack...
